origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'CryptoFinance.get_crypto_trends', 'description': 'Get the latest market trends for a cryptocurrency.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'crypto', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The cryptocurrency name.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'trends', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the latest market trends for the cryptocurrency.'}]}, {'name': 'CryptoFinance.get_crypto_articles', 'description': 'Get recent articles about a cryptocurrency.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'crypto', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The cryptocurrency name.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'articles', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing recent articles about the cryptocurrency.'}]}, {'name': 'CryptoFinance.get_crypto_price', 'description': 'Get the historical price data for a cryptocurrency.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'crypto', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The cryptocurrency name.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'INTEGER', 'description': 'The year for which to get historical price data.'}, {'name': 'quarter', 'type': 'INTEGER', 'description': 'The quarter for which to get historical price data.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'prices', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing historical price data for the cryptocurrency.'}]}, {'name': 'CryptoFinance.get_live_price', 'description': 'Get the current live price of a cryptocurrency.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'crypto', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The cryptocurrency name.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'live_price', 'description': 'The current live price of the cryptocurrency.'}]}, {'name': 'CryptoFinance.get_crypto_code', 'description': 'Get the trading code for a cryptocurrency.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'crypto', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The cryptocurrency name.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'code', 'description': 'The trading code for the cryptocurrency.'}]}, {'name': 'CryptoFinance.get_investment_strategies', 'description': 'Get investment strategies for a cryptocurrency.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'crypto', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The cryptocurrency name.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'strategies', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing investment strategies for the cryptocurrency.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要研究Ethereum的市场趋势。首先，从最新的区块链技术文章中获取5篇与Ethereum相关的研究文章。然后，获取2024年第一季度Ethereum的历史价格数据。接着，获取Ethereum当前的实时交易数据。最后，通过加密货币名称获取Ethereum的交易代码，并获取一些投资策略。当前这一步的目标是什么?
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'crypto'的值是什么?
